about.pageTitle: About Us - asyncz | Our Story & Mission
about.metaDescription: Learn about asyncz's mission to revolutionize scheduling and discover the Deviofy team behind the innovative platform that serves businesses worldwide.
about.heroDescription: We're revolutionizing how businesses manage time and appointments. asyncz by Deviofy combines cutting-edge technology with intuitive design to create the ultimate scheduling platform.
about.ourStory1: In 2022, our founders at Deviofy noticed a common problem across industries: businesses were struggling with fragmented scheduling tools that didn't work together. Healthcare providers juggled multiple systems, consultants lost bookings due to poor interfaces, and event planners spent hours coordinating schedules manually.
about.ourStory2: We envisioned a single platform that could handle any scheduling need - from simple appointments to complex group events with voting mechanisms. asyncz was born from this vision, combining the power of modern technology with the simplicity that busy professionals need.
about.ourStory3: Today, asyncz serves over 50 users across 3+ countries, proving that when you build something with genuine care for user experience, people notice.
about.industryRecognitionDesc: Featured in TechCrunch and Product Hunt
about.missionVisionSubtitle: We're building the future of time management, one appointment at a time.
about.missionDesc: To eliminate scheduling friction and help businesses focus on what they do best. We believe that time is the most valuable resource, and our mission is to help everyone make the most of it through intelligent, intuitive scheduling solutions.
about.visionDesc: A world where scheduling is effortless, intelligent, and accessible to everyone. We envision asyncz as the global standard for appointment management, powering millions of businesses and enabling seamless coordination across all industries.
about.valuesSubtitle: These principles guide everything we do at Deviofy and shape how we build asyncz.

values.title: Innovation First
values.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible in scheduling technology, delivering cutting-edge solutions that anticipate future needs.

values.title: Customer Success
values.description: Your success is our success. We're committed to providing exceptional support and ensuring our platform grows with your business.

values.title: Reliability
values.description: Built on enterprise-grade infrastructure, asyncz provides the reliability and security that businesses depend on every day.

values.title: Global Accessibility
values.description: We believe scheduling should be simple for everyone, everywhere. Our platform serves businesses across 150+ countries.

about.journeySubtitle: From startup to global platform - here's how asyncz came to life.

faq.metaDescription: Find answers to frequently asked questions about asyncz scheduling platform. Learn about features, pricing, integrations, and how to get started.
faq.heroDescription: Find answers to common questions about asyncz features, pricing, and getting started

questions.question: What is asyncz and how does it work?
questions.answer: asyncz is a comprehensive scheduling platform designed to streamline appointment management for businesses of all sizes. It combines calendar management, branch coordination, expert scheduling, and analytics into one unified platform. asyncz works by providing intuitive tools for scheduling appointments, managing multiple locations, coordinating team members, and analyzing business performance.

questions.question: How do I get started with asyncz?
questions.answer: Getting started is simple! Click 'Try for Free' on our homepage to access your 28-day free trial. You can explore all Premium features during the trial period. After registration, you'll be guided through the setup process where you can add your business information, create branches, add team members, and configure your services.

questions.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use asyncz?
questions.answer: No technical knowledge is required! asyncz is designed with user-friendliness in mind. Our intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to manage schedules, appointments, and business operations. We also provide comprehensive support and documentation to help you get the most out of the platform.

questions.question: Can I migrate my existing appointments to asyncz?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide tools and support to help you migrate your existing appointment data to asyncz. Our customer success team can assist you with the migration process to ensure a smooth transition from your current scheduling system.

questions.question: What calendar views are available?
questions.answer: asyncz offers three comprehensive calendar views: Day view for detailed daily scheduling, Week view for weekly planning and coordination, and Month view for long-term planning. All views support drag-and-drop functionality for easy appointment management.

questions.question: How does branch management work?
questions.answer: Branch management allows you to organize multiple business locations from a single platform. You can assign experts to specific branches, manage branch-specific schedules, and control access permissions. Branch managers can only see and manage their assigned locations, while company managers have full access across all branches.

questions.question: What is the blacklist protection feature?
questions.answer: Blacklist protection automatically blocks appointments from customers based on email addresses or phone numbers you've flagged. This feature helps prevent problematic customers from booking appointments and maintains service quality. It's available in Pro and Premium plans.

questions.question: How does custom branding work?
questions.answer: Custom branding allows you to add your company logo to email notifications, appointment confirmations, and reminders. This creates a professional, consistent brand experience for your customers. Advanced branding options in Premium plans include custom domains for appointment booking.

questions.question: What analytics and reports are available?
questions.answer: asyncz provides comprehensive analytics including appointment trends, expert utilization, revenue tracking, customer engagement metrics, and no-show rates. Premium plans include advanced business insights and detailed performance reports to help optimize your operations.

questions.question: What's included in the free plan?
questions.answer: The free plan includes basic calendar management for up to 3 experts, 2 procedures, 1 branch, basic analytics, chatbot support, and 5 Collabriq scheduler events per month. It's perfect for individuals and solo entrepreneurs getting started with digital scheduling.

questions.question: What's the difference between monthly and yearly billing?
questions.answer: Yearly billing provides approximately 17% savings compared to monthly billing. For example, the Pro plan costs $11.99/month when billed monthly, or $119.99/year ($9.95/month) when billed annually. All yearly plans come with the same features and support.

questions.question: How does the 28-day free trial work?
questions.answer: New users get full access to Premium plan features for 28 days at no cost. No credit card is required to start the trial. After the trial period, your account automatically reverts to the free plan unless you choose to upgrade to a paid plan.

questions.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing cycle. We'll prorate charges for upgrades and provide credits for downgrades.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans. All payments are processed securely through encrypted payment gateways.

questions.question: Is there a student discount available?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer free Pro plan access to verified students. Contact our support team with your student credentials to apply for the student plan. This includes all Pro features at no cost during your studies.

questions.question: Does asyncz work on mobile devices?
questions.answer: Yes, asyncz is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all devices including smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers. You can manage appointments, view schedules, and access all features from any device with an internet connection.

questions.question: Can I integrate asyncz with my existing website?
questions.answer: Yes, Pro and Premium plans include embeddable appointment widgets that you can integrate into your existing website. Premium plans also offer custom domain integration for seamless brand consistency.

questions.question: What integrations are available?
questions.answer: asyncz integrates with popular calendar applications, email systems, and business tools. Enterprise plans include API access for custom integrations, single sign-on (SSO), and advanced third-party connections.

questions.question: Is my data secure and backed up?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security measures including SSL encryption, regular security audits, and automated backups. Your data is stored in secure, compliant data centers with 99.9% uptime guarantee.

questions.question: Can I export my data?
questions.answer: Yes, you can export your appointment data, customer information, and reports at any time. We provide various export formats including CSV and PDF to ensure you always have access to your business data.

questions.question: What user roles are available?
questions.answer: asyncz offers four user roles: Company Manager (full access), Branch Manager (branch-specific access), Expert (personal schedule access), and Receptionist (branch calendar access). Each role has specific permissions tailored to their responsibilities.

questions.question: How many users can I add to my account?
questions.answer: User limits depend on your plan: Free plan supports basic user management, Starter plan includes multiple users, Pro plan offers advanced user management, and Premium plan provides unlimited users with detailed permission controls.

questions.question: Can I control what each user can see and do?
questions.answer: Yes, asyncz provides role-based access control. You can customize permissions for each user role, ensuring team members only access information and features relevant to their responsibilities.

questions.question: What support options are available?
questions.answer: Support varies by plan: Free and Starter plans include chatbot support, Pro plans add email support, and Premium plans provide 24/7 priority support with live chat and dedicated customer success managers.

questions.question: Do you provide training for new users?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive onboarding resources including video tutorials, documentation, and webinar training sessions. Premium customers receive personalized training sessions with their dedicated customer success manager.

questions.question: How quickly do you respond to support requests?
questions.answer: Response times vary by plan: Email support typically responds within 24 hours, while Premium priority support provides responses within 2-4 hours. Emergency issues for Premium customers receive immediate attention.

questions.question: Is there a knowledge base or documentation?
questions.answer: Yes, we maintain extensive documentation, video tutorials, and a searchable knowledge base covering all asyncz features. These resources are available 24/7 and regularly updated with new content.

questions.question: What's included in Enterprise plans?
questions.answer: Enterprise plans include white-label implementation, unlimited branches/experts/procedures, custom domain integration, API access, SSO integration, dedicated account management, custom deployment options, and enhanced security compliance (GDPR, SOC 2).

questions.question: Do you offer on-premise deployment?
questions.answer: Yes, Enterprise customers can choose on-premise deployment options for enhanced security and control. This includes dedicated servers, custom security configurations, and local data storage to meet specific compliance requirements.

questions.question: Can you develop custom features for our business?
questions.answer: Enterprise plans include custom development options. Our team can create specialized features, integrations, and workflows tailored to your specific business requirements. Contact our enterprise sales team to discuss your needs.

posts.title: AI Scheduling Playbook for Multi-Branch Teams
posts.excerpt: Frameworks to align operations, automations, and analytics across every location.
content: Operational complexity scales quickly when your brand expands. asyncz centralizes rules so every branch follows the same, proven playbook.
Start by mapping your services, availability rules, and exceptions. asyncz's rule engine lets you apply them once and reuse them everywhere.
Layer analytics on top to keep leadership aware of utilization, demand, and bottlenecks before they affect the customer experience.
posts.author: Asyncz Editorial Team

posts.title: Automation Blueprint: Reduce No-Shows with asyncz
posts.excerpt: Step-by-step automation templates to keep calendars full and customers accountable.
content: Combine confirmation windows, payment rules, and reminder cadences to dramatically cut no-shows without adding admin overhead.
asyncz connects WhatsApp, SMS, and email so your customers always receive nudges on their preferred channel.
Use escalation paths for high-value appointments and automatically trigger waitlist invitations when a slot opens.
posts.author: Asyncz Customer Success

posts.title: Analytics Guide for Multi-Branch Operators
posts.excerpt: Dashboards and metrics asyncz customers track to increase utilization and revenue.
content: Beyond basic counts, asyncz highlights the conversion, retention, and rebooking trends that predict revenue.
Benchmark each branch on utilization, staffing efficiency, and channel performance to prioritize coaching.
Feed these insights back into marketing and hiring plans so you keep winning the right customers at the right time.
posts.author: Asyncz Data Team
